name: crypto
content:
crypto noun
(COMPUTING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ]
  computing
  specialized (also Crypto) short form of
cryptocurrency : Which are the best performing cryptos? Many people think they can make money from Crypto.
[ U ]
  computing
  specialized short form of
encryption : If you're using strong crypto, there's nothing anyone could do to decrypt that data.
More examplesFewer examplesOur beginners' guide to bitcoin has all you need to know about crypto.Which crypto should I invest in?Previously these tools have been limited to systems administrators and those very intimate with crypto, infosec, and networking.This version of the product embodies only weak crypto.

crypto noun
(ORGANISM)
[ U ] US short form of
cryptosporidium : Crypto made 400,000 people sick that year. a crypto outbreak
More examplesFewer examplesCrypto is chlorine-resistant so can survive in chlorinated pools.Very few people die from crypto.
